ranked_diseases.disease_name: Adrenal hyperplasia, congenital, due to 21-hydroxylase deficiency
ranked_diseases.explanation: This condition directly correlates with the phenotypic features of clitoral hypertrophy and hyperpigmentation, as demonstrated in multiple similar cases.

ranked_diseases.disease_name: Adrenal hyperplasia, congenital, due to 11-hydroxylase deficiency
ranked_diseases.explanation: While less common, this disorder can also present with similar symptoms due to excess androgen production.
This condition can induce hyperpigmentation and may present with clitoral hypertrophy, though it typically has other distinguishing features.

ranked_diseases.disease_name: Congenital adrenal hyperplasia due to 17-alpha-hydroxylase deficiency
ranked_diseases.explanation: This condition can lead to hormonal imbalances that might result in similar symptoms, though it is less directly related.
